modName: V2B AVAIL TOMORROW eN0x COMPILE HDR bloom ENB with FXAAInj
summary: HIGHEST FPS and MOST BEAUTIFUL HDR ENB FXAAINJ using SKSE and SSAO fast mode AVAILABLE..
descriptionHtml:
WARNING

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - 4gb+ ram, 2.4ghx Q4 proc, 1+gb ddr5 VRAM

IF YOU DONT HAVE THOSE DONT USE THIS..
==================================================================================================================================================================================

Make your Skyrim look the way it was supposed to using these beautiful mods COMPILED together by team eN0x - HDR bloom combined with True Immersion lighting and ENB vignette true eye DOF combined to being you pastel colors and a surreal texture appearance.

This is a highly graphic intensive mod so please be certain you have a machine capable of running HIGH/ULTRA level graphics

DIRECTIONS FOR AA and AF after INSTALL! - TURN off all AA and AF in the OPTION of SKYRIM LAUNCHER! the scripting for those filters is much too long and meant for a console system.. and doenst take advantage of the capabilities of your PC..

for ATI users, open up Control Center and turn the AF to 8-16X (depending on system perf) 
turn up MIPMAP all the way, and turn off AA in this program as well

FOR NVIDIA users, open up your GFX card control and set it to similar settings as above..

you an also create a save preference file and save it to the TESV.exe

open you SKYRIM folder in the programs folder, and launch FXAAinj.exe - edit the AA options to your preferences, this is also where you can edit the BLOOM amount in the game as well, Experiment with the slider until you find a setting you dig in game! 

with these settings, your GFX proc will be able to handle AA and AF much more easily.. im running 16x on both with this set up and it looks AMAZING - I\'m pulling roughly 25-32fps on ONE ATI card @ 1gbddr5 vram w/ a AMD Q4 @ 2.2ghx... THIS IS UNHEARD OF AT THESE SPECS..

==================================================================================================================================================================================

USE WITH SKSE for higher FPS 

WARNING TO ALL USERS ATTEMPTING TO USE THIS MOD! BE AWARE TO MAKE BACKUPS OF YOUR SKYRIM.ini and skyrimpref.ini BEFORE INSTALLING THIS MOD.. if you dont you run the risk of not being able to revert back to a working version of skyrim.. if you encounter any issues.. not to worry i have provided a stock ini in the d/l section

**************************************************************************************************************************************
**************************************************************************************************************************************

- Revert to your stable uGrids to load
1.	Backup SkyrimPrefs.ini, Skyrim.ini and your Skyrim \'Saves\' folder.
2.	Right click on Skyrim.ini in My Documents My Games Skyrim and uncheck \"Read Only\" in the file\'s properties.
3.	Load your last save game.
4.	Press tilde on your keyboard, most commonly placed directly to the left of \"1.\" If it is elsewhere, the keyboard symbol should be ` or \". If all else fails hit every key on the keyboard until a large, semi-transparent overlay appears on the bottom half of the screen.
5.	In the now-visible in-game console type setini \"ugridstoload:general\" 5
6.	Hit Return on your keyboard.
7.	Type saveini
8.	Hit Return on your keyboard.
9.	Type refreshini
10.	Hit Return on your keyboard.
11.	Close the console using tilde.
12.	Create a new save game.
13.	Exit Skyrim.
14.	Delete Skyrim.ini in My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim.
15.	Reload the Skyrim configuration tool.
16.	Close the tool.
17.	Re-tweak Skyrim.ini if necessary (and SkyrimPrefs.ini if it has since been modified).
18.	Reload Skyrim and your most recent save.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

READ THE README TO INSTALL

MANY graphic files, dont touch them you may make your game very unstable if you do..

spent many hours modifying and putting together these mods to make sure they were stable..

if you have any problems please COMMENT

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

HUGE CREDIT TO THESE AUTHORS! THANK YOU FOR THESE MODS - I JUST ORGANIZED AND EDITED THEM IN A WAY SO THEY COULD ALL WORK FLAWLESSLY TOGETHER!

ENB - Boris
http://enbdev.com/index_en.html

Hdr enhanced shaders - topioks 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=822

FXAA tool - somedude 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=131

Realistic Lighting - Plutoman101 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654

ALL CREDIT GOES TO THERE CREATIVITY! PLEASE REDISTRIBUTE THIS MOD FOR FREE!


+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
author: eN0x
